SEARCH
Package com.pablovilan.usermanagement.model.services

Interface PermissionService

public interface PermissionService
Service interface for managing permissions in the system. This interface defines methods for creating, deleting, finding permissions, and assigning/removing permissions to/from roles.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Boolean
    asignPermissionsToRole(List<Permission> permissionList, String role)
    Assigns a permission to a role.
    boolean
    createPermission(String name, String description)
    Creates a new permission with the specified name and description.
    boolean
    deletePermission(String name)
    Deletes a permission by its name.
    Permission
    findPermissionByName(String name)
    Finds a permission by its name.
    Boolean
    removePermissionsFromRole(List<Permission> permissionList, String role)
    Removes a permission from a role.

  • Method Details

    • createPermission

      boolean createPermission(String name, String description)
      Creates a new permission with the specified name and description.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new permission
      description - a description of the permission
      Returns:
      true if the permission was created successfully, false otherwise

    • deletePermission

      boolean deletePermission(String name)
      Deletes a permission by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the permission to delete
      Returns:
      true if the permission was deleted successfully, false otherwise

    • findPermissionByName

      Permission findPermissionByName(String name)
      Finds a permission by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the permission to find
      Returns:
      the Permission object if found, or null if not found

    • asignPermissionsToRole

      Boolean asignPermissionsToRole(List<Permission> permissionList, String role)
      Assigns a permission to a role.
      Parameters:
      permissionList - the list of permissions to assign
      role - the name of the role to assign the permissions to
      Returns:
      true if the permissions were assigned successfully, false otherwise

    • removePermissionsFromRole

      Boolean removePermissionsFromRole(List<Permission> permissionList, String role)
      Removes a permission from a role.
      Parameters:
      permissionList - the list of permissions to remove
      role - the name of the role to remove the permissions from
      Returns:
      true if the permissions were removed successfully, false otherwise
